resources.string:
1. Application Introduction
 "PNF Master" is an Android application that can remotely control lower limb rehabilitation robots through Bluetooth connection. This application supports adjusting parameters such as motor speed, number of cycles, and operating mode to meet different rehabilitation needs.

 2. Operation Guide
 Users can easily switch the currently controlled motor through the toggle button in the upper right corner of the application interface; in the more menu item in the upper right corner, users can save rehabilitation data to the cloud for long-term monitoring and analysis; Users can also delete saved data through this application and customize some options to obtain a better user experience. PNF Master provides simple rehabilitation robot control functions, providing users with a more convenient and efficient rehabilitation experience.
You must authorize the Bluetooth-related functions to connect to the rehabilitation robot. Do you agree?
Enter the message to be sent here
Please complete your personal information, which will help customize a better training plan for you.
Assessment and diagnosis conducted by medical professionals on patients, including health assessment and medical history.
Developing personalized rehabilitation treatment plans for patients, including physical therapy, rehabilitation training, medication, and rehabilitation aids.
Recording various progress and improvement of patients during the rehabilitation process.
Setting individualized rehabilitation goals for patients, including functional recovery, pain relief, and improvement of quality of life.
How would you like to be addressed?
Last step: If any, please provide the following rehabilitation information.\nYou can modify this information at any time later.
You can still use all the basic functions by skipping the login, but you will not be able to use the personalised services, so it is recommended that you login to use the app.
A Bluetooth connection has not been established with the device. Are you sure you want to return to the main screen?
Pairing completed. Tap again to connect.
Socket successfully connected. You can start training now.
This feature is not available to users who are not logged in. Would you like to log in noew?
Please enter your username and password
The password does not match the confirmation password!
Bluetooth scanning permission is required to use this feature, please grant Bluetooth scanning permission
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
You have denied the scanning permission.
What do you want to know?
Hello! I am PNF Master. How can I help you?

You are the built-in AI in the PNF Master software, which also goes by the name of PNF Master. Yufeng is the author of this app. This app has the following features: When a user asks for help in using the app, the answer can be based on the following 1. Users can enter the Bluetooth connection interface by clicking the Bluetooth symbol on the top right corner of the homepage. In this interface, click the Start Scan button on the upper right corner to start Bluetooth scanning, and click the searched device to connect. After successful connection, it will automatically return to the main interface. Note: The first time you click this button, you need to grant the appropriate permissions to the app; 2. There are four buttons on the main screen: Start, Send, Motor Enable and Motor Disable. Clicking on the Start button establishes a socket connection with the Bluetooth module of the motor before any other operation can be performed. The Motor Enable and Motor Disable buttons correspond to start the motor rotation and stop the motor rotation respectively; 3. Users can call out the menu by swiping right on the screen or clicking on the menu button in the upper left corner. Tap My Profile to view and edit user\'s personal and medical information; tap My Tasks to view current and historical parameters. The AI button in the lower right corner can summon me; 4. By clicking My Task, you can set the training parameters such as the amount of force generated by the motor, the motor stop position and the training time. In addition, the AI can also recommend appropriate rehabilitation programmes based on the medical information entered by the user. Reply the user in English.
After changing the language, you will return to the main interface. Continue?
Click on the plus sign in the top right corner to create your first set of parameters
Are you sure you want to delete this parameter?
